introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Cuizly Technologies ("we", "our" or "Cuizly") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy informs you about how we collect, use and protect your information when you use our service.

sharing.title: 4. Information sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following cases:
items: To protect our rights and security

rights.title: 5. Your rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete or limit the use of your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us at cuizlycanada@gmail.com.

contact.title: 6. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, contact us at:

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.address: Address: San Francisco, CA, United States

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: This entire site is subject to Canadian and international legislation on copyright and intellectual property. All reproduction rights are reserved, including for downloadable documents and iconographic and photographic representations.

personal.title: Personal Data
personal.content: In accordance with Canadian personal information protection law, you have the right to access, rectify and delete data concerning you. To exercise this right, contact us at cuizlycanada@gmail.com

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: Cuizly Technologies cannot be held responsible for direct and indirect damage caused to the user's equipment, when accessing the site, and resulting either from the use of equipment that does not meet the indicated specifications, or from the appearance of a bug or incompatibility.

law.title: Applicable Law
law.content: Any dispute in relation to the use of the Cuizly site is subject to Canadian and Quebec law. Exclusive jurisdiction is attributed to the competent courts of Montreal.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Cuizly, you agree to be bound by these terms of use and all applicable laws and regulations.

service.title: 2. Service description
service.content: Cuizly is a platform that connects consumers to restaurants in Montreal by offering personalized culinary offers through artificial intelligence.

responsibilities.title: 3. User responsibilities
items: Maintain the security of your account
Use the service legally and respectfully
Do not disrupt the operation of the platform

intellectual.title: 4. Intellectual property
intellectual.content: All content on Cuizly, including text, graphics, logos and software, is the property of Cuizly Technologies and is protected by intellectual property laws.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of liability
liability.content: Cuizly cannot be held responsible for indirect, incidental or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our service.

modifications.title: 6. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms of use at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after publication on this page.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these terms of use, contact us at:

pricingLanding.title: Pricing for everyone
pricingLanding.subtitle: A free offer for consumers, affordable professional solutions for restaurants.

team.title: The team behind Cuizly
team.subtitle: Meet the person revolutionizing culinary discovery in Montreal
team.founderIntro: The vision of a passionate student transforming the Montreal gastronomic experience
team.educationDetails: Permanent resident of Canada and Congolese🇨🇩 student pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Natural and Formal Sciences: Computer Science, at the University of Montreal.
team.journeyDetails: From a simple observation when he arrived in Quebec 2 years ago: He discovered too many multicultural restaurant choices, but not enough landmarks to eat well according to his budget and tastes.
team.visionDetails: With Cuizly, Iker builds an intelligent bridge between consumers and restaurateurs through the AI-powered culinary matching system. With the vision to transform each piece of data into a personalized experience and redefine how we discover gastronomy in the city.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: A question? A suggestion? We're here to help.

what.title: What is a cookie?
what.content: A cookie is a small text file placed on your computer when visiting a website. It allows to recognize your browser and keep certain information about your preferences or past actions.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the site to function. They allow you to navigate the site and use its essential features like authentication and security.

performance.title: Performance cookies
performance.content: These cookies collect information about how you use our site, like the most visited pages. This data helps us improve the site's operation.

functionality.title: Functionality cookies
functionality.content: These cookies allow the site to remember your choices (like your username or language) and provide enhanced and more personalized features.

management.title: Cookie management
management.content1: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can configure most browsers to prevent their placement.
management.content2: However, if you do this, you may have to manually adjust some preferences each time you visit a site and some services and features may not work.

disable.title: How to disable cookies
disable.chrome: Chrome: Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies and other site data
disable.firefox: Firefox: Options → Privacy and security → Cookies and site data
disable.safari: Safari: Preferences → Privacy → Manage website data
disable.edge: Edge: Settings → Cookies and site permissions → Manage and delete cookies

third.title: Third-party cookies
third.content: Some cookies may be placed by third-party services we use, like Google Analytics to measure site audience. These third-party services have their own privacy policies.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding our use of cookies, contact us at:
